author: Zohaib Gillani
text: After religious extremism, another culture is developing in Pakistan that is political extremism. And it will ruin the current and future generations of Pakistan.

author: Zohaib Gillani
text: Being a Pakistani I feel shame and embarrassment what happens today at Allah k Ghar. This should not be done. Hum Pakistani apni harkato ki wja se he duniya main zaleel hoty hain. An Absolute shame.

author: Zohaib Gillani
text: First time in the history of Pakistan, Bhutto family will work under leadership of Sharif Family. #Karma #امپورٹڈ_حکومت_نامنظور

author: Zohaib Gillani
text: If Shame could have a face https://t.co/AasE47IwT4

author: Zohaib Gillani
text: Look at the reply of our Foreign minister , complete shame, running a dynasty not a political democracy https://t.co/zqHQSdz9sV
